entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:46 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 01:56 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
